question: Which of the following factors do not affect the value of modulus of elasticity of a body?
option3: Length and volume and of the body
answer: Length and volume and of the body
explanation: Modulus of elasticity (E) depends upon the nature of material of the body and the manner in which the body is deformed. Modulus of elasticity (E) depends upon the temperature of the body. Modulus of elasticity (E) is independent of the dimensions (length, volume etc.) of the body
